root: ^A bright fiery light pours out into the courtyard from one of the large gateways.
^Nearby, a robed figure continues to chant its monotone incantations, slowly drawing more of the demons from the infernal gateway.

aftercombat: ^As the summoner collapses, so does the massive portal behind them. All the while a nearly summoned demon screams in terror as it is pulled back into the flaming Abyss.
^With the third gateway collapsed, the courtyard of the Black Citadel is suddenly smothered by an eerie silence.

^Then, with a loud explosion the large doors of the Citadel swing open. A bright crimson burst of light illuminates the stained glass windows of the Black Citadel itself with almost blinding intensity while a restless wind starts to whirl around the structure, swelling into a violent conflux of energy!

^As you catch your breath you notice the ongoing battle in the distance looks almost mesmerising. Various lights continuously color the dark clouds above in magically charged hues of red, blue and green.
